welcome_message_body: Welcome to North Union, a charming city known for its friendly locals and beautiful scenery. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Morgantown Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Morgantown Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and includes amenities such as restaurants, shops, and rental car services.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is used for private and charter flights and includes a lounge area and private jet services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
